title: Job Responds and God Describes Behemoth
summary: Job humbly admits his insignificance and chooses to remain silent. God then describes Behemoth, a powerful creature, to emphasize His ability to create and govern mighty forces beyond human understanding.

faq.question: What is Job’s reaction to God’s challenge?
faq.answer: He acknowledges his unworthiness and says, 'I will say no more.'

faq.question: What is Behemoth a symbol of?
faq.answer: God’s unmatched power and the majesty of His creation.
